item.title: Are Californians Near the Tipping Point?
item.description: Even in a state as beautiful as this one, residents can only bear destructive misgovernance for so long.

item.title: 60 Minutes Humiliates Itself on Israel
item.description: Americans were just treated to a variety of spurious allegations by two onetime State Department employees.

item.title: The Congressional Black Caucus Has a Geriatric Problem
item.description: The House members in the CBC include a disproportionate share of elderly members whose ability to do their jobs is questionable.

item.title: Karen Bass, the World’s Least Sympathetic Scapegoat
item.description: But she isn’t the real answer to questions about who bears responsibility, and Gavin Newsom is well aware of it.

item.title: New Mexico Governor Plays Game with Data to Claim Child Poverty Success
item.description: Governor Michelle Lujan Grisham (D.) has had to resort to pick ‘n mix statistics to make it look like her policies have improved childhood poverty.
